content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5) storing coal
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=42.5, y=-80.5), and (x=43.5, y=-80.5) waiting for source items
- Iron Chest at position (x=44.5, y=-80.5) storing iron plates
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (x=45.5, y=-80.5), (x=47.5, y=-80.5), and (x=49.5, y=-80.5) storing coal and iron plates

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (x=-13.0, y=-48.0), (x=-11.0, y=-48.0), and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=-15.5, y=-48.5), (x=-14.5, y=-46.5), and (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items
- Iron Chests at positions (x=-16.5, y=-48.5) and (x=-14.5, y=-47.5) for storage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract from a chest
- Ensure the chest is not empty before attempting to extract items. Check the inventory of the chest to confirm it contains items.

### Errors with inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source entity (e.g., chest or belt) contains items that the inserter can pick up. Verify that the supply chain is not disrupted and that the source is adequately stocked.

### Errors with mining drills due to full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests at the drop positions of mining drills to prevent them from becoming full and halting production.
